description: SmartGit cannot find `git` binary, hence it's not usable.
summary: How to grant access to the `git ` binary

description:
Just joking. It's a good thing really. Too many tools have polished interfaces that e.g. display the commit graph nicely but are lacking thoroughly in other areas, especially work flow. With SmartGit I can finally do everything (so far) I can do with git CLI.

One drawback that the flatpak brings: SmartGit can't access the system ssh binary so I'm stuck with the internal ssh implementation. It doesn't seem to handle ed25519 SSH keys.
summary: Great tool that exposes Git for the Git it is

description:
Very good tool to get the Git stuff done. Many special functionality of git are supported:
- interactive rebase
- git flow
- managing submodules
- creating patches

Hasta el momento parece una excelente opción, ha sido simple de agregar repositorios y es muy útil la forma en que muestra nuevos cambios similar a meld (en un monitor grande mejor aún). Debería tener más opciones la versión gratuita.
